On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will offer post-debate analysis of Tuesday night’s vice presidential face-off between Indiana Governor Mike Pence and Virginia Senator Tim Kaine.

Marlow will be joined by Arkansas Attorney General Leslie Rutledge and Cam Edwards, the SiriusXM host of Cam and Company from NRAnews.com, which is broadcast from Farmville, Virginia, the location of Tuesday’s VP debate.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Center for Security Policy President Frank Gaffney will also discuss the VP debate, as well as the situation in Syria.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Veteran pollster Pat Caddell will break down the latest polls for us.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
